Class ShowMessage

java.lang.Object
ShowMessage
public class ShowMessage extends Object
The ShowMessage class is responsible for displaying messages on the screen. It provides abstraction for font details and allows for easy customization and extension. The class is used to display messages in the game without directly referencing font details. It also provides different constructors for flexibility in specifying font type and size. The ShowMessage class is part of the game's specification and allows for easy changes and enhancements. The ShowMessage class can be used to display messages with different fonts and sizes. The ShowMessage class provides methods to show the message on the screen.

Example usage:

 ShowMessage showMessage = new ShowMessage("Hello, world!", 100, 100);
 showMessage.Show();
Author:
YongchunLi

  • Constructor Details

    • ShowMessage

      public ShowMessage(String messageDetail, double X, double Y)
      Constructs a ShowMessage object with the specified message, X and Y coordinates.
      Parameters:
      messageDetail - the detail of the message to be displayed
      X - the X coordinate of the message's left-bottom position
      Y - the Y coordinate of the message's left-bottom position

    • ShowMessage

      public ShowMessage(String messageDetail, int X, int Y, int myfontSize)
      Constructs a ShowMessage object with the specified message, X and Y coordinates, and font size.
      Parameters:
      messageDetail - the detail of the message to be displayed
      X - the X coordinate of the message's left-bottom position
      Y - the Y coordinate of the message's left-bottom position
      myfontSize - the font size of the message

    • ShowMessage

      public ShowMessage(String messageDetail, int X, int Y, String fonttype, int fontSize)
      Constructs a ShowMessage object with the specified message, X and Y coordinates, font type, and font size.
      Parameters:
      messageDetail - the detail of the message to be displayed
      X - the X coordinate of the message's left-bottom position
      Y - the Y coordinate of the message's left-bottom position
      fonttype - the address of the customized font type
      fontSize - the font size of the message

  • Method Details

    • Show

      public void Show()
      Shows the message on the screen using the specified font.
